body:
pasting the sponge log while it's accessible:


Looks similar with https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/17335. I will debug it today.
Bumping this to P1 since I've now seen it on OPT tests , not just *san . This hasn't been reported in the wild afaik but this is something that certainly could arise out there.
